text: Shyamal Bose (- born 8 August 1963) is an Indian film director, actor and screenwriter in Bengali Cinema or Tollywood. He is also the co-founder of the theatre group Baghbazar Natya Kendra, situated in Kolkata. He is known for his films Antim Yatra (2015), Bastav (2016) & Asamay (2017). ==Career== He started his career with acting in theatres in Kolkata at the age of 20. His first film as writer-director is Notun Surjo released in the year 2010, he also acted in the same movie and then he continued to writing & directing films like Neel Swapna, Nayan Tara, Alor Khonje and others. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
